description:
Captain Clayton and James are wounded in a surprise terrorist attack, and Penny is crushed to learn the identity of the bomber. As aliens turn deceased hostages into weapons, G-Reaction engines all over the world mysteriously fall silent.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shinryaku no Mashu! G-hannouro Sadou Sezu!
Teufelswerk der Invasoren: Die G-Reaktions-Reaktoren fallen aus!
The Invaders & Their Evil Powers Firing Up the G-Reaction Engine!
Захватчики и их ужасные технологии. Запуск двигателей G-класса
侵略の魔手! G反応炉作動せず!
